query: At the two-minute mark in the YouTube video uploaded by the channel “GameGrumps” on May 14, 2017 as part of their playthrough of the game Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, the shows’ hosts are competing on one of the game’s racetracks. What was the world record time for that track in the game’s 150cc mode as of June 7, 2023? Express your answer in minutes and seconds, rounding the seconds to the nearest hundredth, e.g. 1:01.001.

tasks.description: Найти информацию о мировом рекорде времени для трека в Mario Kart 8 Deluxe в режиме 150cc на 7 июня 2023 года.

result.query: Найти информацию о мировом рекорде времени для трека в Mario Kart 8 Deluxe в режиме 150cc на 7 июня 2023 года.

facts.fact: The world record for Excitebike Arena in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (150cc) was set at 1:38.971 by Shira on June 3, 2023.
The previous world record for Excitebike Arena was 1:39.305, set by Army on February 11, 2023.
On June 19, 2023, a new world record of 1:41.253 for GCN Yoshi Circuit was set by player 'a'.
The world record for GCN Yoshi Circuit was improved by 0.158 seconds on the same day it was set.

result.summary: As of June 2023, notable world records in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe include Shira's 1:38.971 for Excitebike Arena and 'a's 1:41.253 for GCN Yoshi Circuit.

tasks.description: Извлечь время мирового рекорда из найденной информации.

entities.name: Excitebike Arena
entities.evidence: The world record for Excitebike Arena in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (150cc) was set at 1:38.971 by Shira on June 3, 2023.

entities.name: GCN Yoshi Circuit
entities.evidence: On June 19, 2023, a new world record of 1:41.253 for GCN Yoshi Circuit was set by player 'a'.

key_points: Shira set a world record of 1:38.971 for Excitebike Arena on June 3, 2023.
Player 'a' set a world record of 1:41.253 for GCN Yoshi Circuit on June 19, 2023.

numbers_and_units.context: world record for GCN Yoshi Circuit

tasks.description: Построить логический вывод о времени рекорда и подготовить его к формату ответа.

assumptions: The world records mentioned are accurate and up-to-date as of June 2023.
reasoning_steps: Identify the world records set in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe for the specified tracks and dates.
Extract the relevant times and players associated with each record.
Summarize the findings to present a clear overview of the world records.
conclusions: As of June 2023, the world record for Excitebike Arena in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (150cc) is 1:38.971, set by Shira on June 3, 2023.
The world record for GCN Yoshi Circuit is 1:41.253, set by player 'a' on June 19, 2023.
proposed_answer_outline: 1. World Record for Excitebike Arena: 1:38.971 by Shira on June 3, 2023.
2. World Record for GCN Yoshi Circuit: 1:41.253 by player 'a' on June 19, 2023.

tasks.description: Написать финальный ответ пользователю с временем рекорда в формате минут и секунд.
